name: BBPress Analytics
author: Roni Cohen - www.ronileco.com

sections.description:
This plugin give basic analytics to BBPress forum, it is one of it’s kind and still being developed.
Feel free to ask me anything regarding the plugin at ronileco@gmail.com.
Hope it will bring you guys value.
You can read more about the plugin on my website: http://ronileco.com/bbpress-2-0-analytics-plugin/
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire plugin folder via FTP to /wp-content/plugins/.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. No configurations are needed.

short_description: This plugin give basic analytics to BBPress forum, it is one of it's kind and still being developed.
